title: Ela Minus Adds Tour Dates, Shares Video for New Song “Upwards”: Watch
description: The Colombian electronic artist has expanded her 2025 tour to include new North American shows
author: Nina Corcoran
excerpt: The Colombian electronic artist has expanded her 2025 tour to include new North American shows
text: Ela Minus has announced a handful of new tour dates and shared another new song from Dia, her forthcoming album, titled “Upwards.” The track comes with a music video in which Minus performs in a dark room while surrounded by cameras and vertical screens that project her every move. Watch it below.“Upwards” is the third single Minus has shared in advance of Dia’s release on January 17 via Domino. It follows the previous songs “Combat” and “Broken.” Her studio debut, Acts of Rebellion, came out back in the autumn of 2020.The Colombian electronic artist already planned on performing in Europe next year, but now she’s tacked on a handful of North American shows as well as additional European concerts and new Australian stops. Among the U.S. dates are headlining shows in Los Angeles, Brooklyn, and Chicago. Find Ela Minus’ complete list of tour dates below.Revisit the Rising interview “Ela Minus Makes Techno-Pop for Everyday Rebellion.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Ela Minus:12-14 Berlin, Germany - Silent Green01-17 Bogotá, Colombia - TBA02-01 Manchester, England - Victoria Warehouse ^02-03 Paris, France - Zénith *02-04 Esch-sur-Alzette, Luxembourg - Rockhal *02-05 Utrecht, Netherlands @ TivoliVredenberg *02-06 London, England - Roundhouse *02-07 London, England - Roundhouse *02-08 London, England - Roundhouse *02-09 Leeds, England - O2 Academy Leeds *02-10 Bristol, England - Bristol Beacon *02-11 Brussels, Belgium - Ancienne Belgique *02-12 Brussels, Belgium - Ancienne Belgique *02-14 Berlin, Germany - Velodrom *02-15 Barcelona, Spain - Nitsa|Astin02-20 London, England - Oslo03-07 Mafeking, Australia - Pitch Music & Arts03-08 Meredith, Australia - Golden Plains XVII03-09 Adelaide, Australia - WOMADelaide03-15 Los Angeles, CA - Zebulon03-18 Brooklyn, NY - Public Records03-21 Chicago, IL - Schubas03-27 Mexico City, Mexico - Foro Puebla03-30 Bogotá, Colombia - Estéreo Picnic* with Caribou^ with Floating Points (DJ Set)
html:
Ela Minus has announced a handful of new tour dates and shared another new song from Dia, her forthcoming album, titled “Upwards.” The track comes with a music video in which Minus performs in a dark room while surrounded by cameras and vertical screens that project her every move. Watch it below.

“Upwards” is the third single Minus has shared in advance of Dia’s release on January 17 via Domino. It follows the previous songs “Combat” and “Broken.” Her studio debut, Acts of Rebellion, came out back in the autumn of 2020.

The Colombian electronic artist already planned on performing in Europe next year, but now she’s tacked on a handful of North American shows as well as additional European concerts and new Australian stops. Among the U.S. dates are headlining shows in Los Angeles, Brooklyn, and Chicago. Find Ela Minus’ complete list of tour dates below.

Revisit the Rising interview “Ela Minus Makes Techno-Pop for Everyday Rebellion.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Ela Minus:
